title: The Undertaker
summaries: The Undertaker is a pre-Hardmode gun. The Undertaker (along with 100 Musket Balls) always drops from the first Crimson Heart destroyed in a Crimson world and has a 1/5 (20%) chance of dropping from destroyed Crimson Hearts afterward. The Undertaker also has a 1/5 (20%) chance of being obtained from Crimson(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) and Hematic Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), which can be obtained by fishing in the Crimson.
Its <linked>Corruption</linked> counterpart is the <linked>Musket</linked>. Compared to the Musket, The Undertaker fires much more quickly at the cost of decreased damage per shot.
